wordGroup: rose geranium [植]香叶天竺葵；玫瑰天竺葵

sentences.en: Grains of pollen on a geranium stigma.
sentences.cn: 天竺葵柱头上的花粉颗粒。

sentences.en: Stick a geranium in your hat and be happy!
sentences.cn: 插一支天竺葵在帽檐，快乐吧！

sentences.en: The geranium is a garden plant with red, pink or white flowers.
sentences.cn: 天竺葵是种开红、粉红或白色花的花园植物。
